review.reviewBody: Packaged with care and the chicken was good.
The sauce, onions, ketchup are missing. Its just the bun and dry burger patty.
Worst burger I havehad in years.  Dry and tasteless.
they always accommodate my requirements and food is tasty. customer service is amazing!
ordered Russet Thick-Cut Fries and a Chicken Buddy Burger®  at 2am i was very impressed and everything tasted good ! :)
